task.title: Edit Corpus Template
task.shortdesc: Set default participants and tiers for all sessions to be created in a corpus.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the corpus whose template you wish to edit and select Edit corpus template... from the context menu.
step.stepresult: A Session Template window will appear for the selected corpus, showing the Session Information and Tier Management views.

step.cmd: Edit options as you see fit. Close this window when you are finished making changes.
step.stepresult: These settings will be applied to any sessions subsequently created within the corpus.For further instructions on how to specify information in the Session Information and Tier Management views, consult , , , , and other related pages.
